item.title: Window偏好优化
item.author: Author
item.description: How to Get Back Classic (Full) Context Menu in Windows 11 reg add HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}\InprocServer32 /ve /d "" /f How to remove arrows from shortcuts in Windows 11 REG ADD "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Shell Icons" /v 29 /t REG_SZ /d "" /f
